ui

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a position and value on a grid that can be animated from an old position to a new position.
    Author:
    Sayantani Ghosh, Piyush Mantri, Dinesh Papineni
